title: [Grawood Farmstead, Bonfire]
description: Several split log benches sit in a circle around a massive patch of scorched earth, a place where many a fire seems to have burned.  The grass along the edges is singed and brown, fragile enough to break underfoot, while the air is haunted with the distinct scent of wood smoke.
paths: Obvious paths: northeast, southeast, southwest, northwest
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
